title: 服务器崩溃，求救qwq
author: 零落Y_
txt_content:
服务器崩溃，下面是后台报错，
22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 The server has stopped responding!22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 Spigot 版本: git-PaperSpigot-9b05d00-33d5de3 (MC: 1.8)22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 ------------------------------22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 服务器线程 dump (Look for 插件s here before reporting to Spigot!):22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 ------------------------------22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 Current Thread: 服务器线程22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 PID: 24 | Suspended: false | Native: false | State: RUNNABLE22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 Stack:22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURL连接ion.getInputStream(HttpURL连接ion.java:1441)22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURL连接ionImpl.getInputStream(HttpsURL连接ionImpl.java:254)22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 com.bekvon.bukkit.residence.utils.版本Checker$1.run(版本Checker.java:35)22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71)22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:53)22.07 19:16:36 [服务器] 错误 ------------------------------
这是什么情况qwq，如果在帖子中解释不清的，加我QQ：424183935
解决的话100金粒就是你的了QAQ
